edu.jhu.cs.oose.biblio.gui
Class FilePreviewFactory.PreviewConstructor

java.lang.Object
  edu.jhu.cs.oose.biblio.gui.FilePreviewFactory.PreviewConstructor
All Implemented Interfaces:
FilePreviewVisitor
Enclosing class:
FilePreviewFactory
private static class FilePreviewFactory.PreviewConstructor
extends java.lang.Object
implements FilePreviewVisitor

A visitor class used to construct Preview Panels. There should be one method on this for each kind of PreviewPanel. Each FileMetadata implementation should know which one to call.
